title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: AHP-PSO-Based Music Education Goal System Design and Instruction

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can analyze a 4-dimensional 18-indicator music education objective system and calculate weights using AHP methodology
Learners can verify consistency (CR<0.05) between music education objectives using PSO algorithm
Learners can develop educational content plans reflecting the top 3 cognitive processes (reasoning, reproduction, discrimination)
Learners can design smartphone-compatible music education activities and develop evaluation tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
